name: A Quiet Place
description:
My first Pico8 game, a small "City builder" , with the addition of zombies.

Developed in about 16 hours, it was a very useful project to understand the use of tables in Lua language, and some other stuff like calculating the distance between two points.  I'm aware there are some bugs with the buttons, and it all needs a lot of polishing but it's just an experimental project.

Use arrows to move the cursor. Z to select things, X to move the screen.
